

// the test bench and the machine code is below the code
addi x2, x2, 20
store:
sw x1, x1, 0
addi x1, x1, 1
bne x1, x2, store
addi x30, x30, 1

load:
xor x1, x1, x1
xor x2, x2, x2
lw x1, x1, 0
lw x2, x2, 1
addi x3, x3, 2
lw x3, x3, 0
lw x4, x4, 3
lw x5, x5, 4
lw x6, x6, 5
lw x7, x7, 6
lw x8, x8, 7
lw x9, x9, 8
lw x10, x10, 9
lw x11, x11, 10
lw x12, x12, 11
lw x13, x13, 12
lw x14, x14, 13
lw x15, x15, 14
lw x16, x16, 15
lw x17, x17, 16
lw x18, x18, 17
lw x19, x19, 18
lw x20, x20, 19



addi x31, x31, 1
hlt


// the machine code of each instruction respectively
00010000100000000101000000010011 / 276844563 / 10805013
00000000010000100000000100100011 / 4325667 / 00420123
00001000010000000000010000010011 / 138413075 / 08400413
11111000010001011111100011100011 / 4165335267 / F845F8E3

00001000010000100000001000110011 / 138543667 / 08420233
00010000100001000000001000110011 / 277086771 / 10840233
00001000010000000000000100000011 / 138412291 / 08400103
00010000100000000000010100000011 / 276825347 / 10800503

10010100100000000100010100000011 / 2491434243 / 94804503

11111111110000000000010000010011 / 4290774035 / FFC00413
00000000000000000000000001111111 / 127 / 0000007F
PC1 = 0; Inst_to_wr = 32'h10805013; #2;

PC1 = 2; Inst_to_wr = 32'h08400413; #2; 
PC1 = 3; Inst_to_wr = 32'hF845F8E3; #2; 
PC1 = 4; Inst_to_wr = 32'hF7800413; #2;

PC1 = 22; Inst_to_wr = 32'h7BC03903; #2; 
PC1 = 23; Inst_to_wr = 32'h84003D03; #2; 
PC1 = 24; Inst_to_wr = 32'h8C404103; #2; 
PC1 = 25; Inst_to_wr = 32'h94804503; #2; 
PC1 = 26; Inst_to_wr = 32'h9CC04903; #2;
